description: Global description: This entity contains a harmonised geographic description of a Point of Interest

contents.name: category
contents.description: Category of this point of interest. Allowed values: Those defined by the Factual taxonomy together with the extended categories described by the specification. For instance the value 113 corresponds to beaches, and the value 311 corresponds to museums.
contents.comment: Required property. Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.

contents.name: areaServed
contents.description: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: contactPoint
contents.description: Contact point for the point of interest, e.g. Museum

contents.name: refSeeAlso
contents.description: List of comma separated URLs to one or more related entities.
contents.comment: Since DTDLv2 doesn't support arrays for Properties, a single string will be used.
